column5: can you run 2 deep cycle batteries on a 12v trolling motor to make it run longer or can you only use one at a time ?  if you can how would you do this?
Yes you can but they have to be connected in parallel...here's a link that will help you.  http://www.nyc-arecs.org/Connecting_Batter...nd_Parallel.pdf
An all expense paid trip to Boucherville....
yes that 's it but with me beside you fishing those muskie waters that only a few know about... oh and I am no one of the guys that know
Hey,,,roy come through for a change,,lol ;)
thanx guys i thought it would be like that wanted to make sure tho

Just make sure your batteries are the same. You will only get as much power as your lesser battery. If you use an old one with a new one, you'll only have as much power as the old one. Then its better to run them separate.  Sinker
How long are you getting out of a charge? i was going 3 or 4 days of heavy use per charge on a deep cycle.
